page.title: 17HOUSING QUESTIONNAIRE SLOUGH
page.content:
Questions and answers from an estate agent.
{What sort of houses are popular in {Slough? Flats, bungalows and semi-detached houses. {What kind of people buy houses? Mainly families. {What area is most popular? Shaggy Calf Lane. It has semi-detached houses with big gardens and is fairly modern (1930's). {What is the average price for a house {in this area? Â£52,000 - Â£60,000 This is increasing by 15%p.a. {Why do you think people live in {Slough? There are good shops and lot of work at Heathrow and on the Trading Estate.
